column5: I notice the avatars no longer show when the member joined this board.  Not that it really matters, but it was kinda nice to know how long everyone has been around.  And if that's all I've got to complain about in life, I guess I'm doing OK

Didn't really mean much to me Lew!! The last upgrade was 2006 and for us "old timers" it did not provide a clear picture as to how long you are a member. I guess that this is the 4th upgrade since 2001?
On My PC, if I run my cursor over the posters name, it will show his complete profile.
Same on my mac, still a hassle though.
Yeah, your right fireball, thanks.  As I said above, it wasn't a big deal, I was just curious.
